name: Exp1_NoSepPlast_alpha_yoked_tanh_Oja
cmdLine: export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 &&  PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/local/nvidia/bin:/opt/hadoop/latest/bin && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64/  &&  export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8  &&   export LANG=C.UTF-8  &&  cd /home/work/ && python3 omniglot.py --nbclasses 5  --nbiter 5000000 --rule oja --activation tanh --stepsizelr 1000000 --prestime 1 --gamma 0.3 --alphatype yoked --lr 1e-4 --rngseed {{mesos.instance}}
